name: Workout Tracker
description: My first React Native project. An iOS app that provides a simple way to keep track of your daily exercises. Built with React Native using Expo, typescript and sqlite.

name: Cookbook.
description: Demo application to view and share recipes with others. Front and back end built with React and python/django. Also utilizes the spoonacular API to search and favorite recipes.

name: ScubaLog
description: One of my first Projects, and one that I'm passionate about. Scubalog is a way for divers to digitally log their dives. An update is in the works utilizing a more modern tech stack with NextJS, TailwindCSS and PostgreSQL.

name: fb-sync
description: CLI tool I built to sync 2 firestore databases that belong to different projects. I initailly built this tool to sync my current company's development firestore collections with our production firestore collections instead of doing it manually.

name: This Page
description: This portfolio site you're on right now! Built from scratch with React and TailwindCSS. Data is populated via JSON for ease of maintenance in the future.
